Address: 6/335 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Under Contract!
If you have been searching for a cosy, low maintenance unit with all the modern comforts one would expect, then look no further! Located in a popular complex this neat as a pin, 2 bedroom unit is sure to impress. Currently leased to September 2018 at $1347pcm, this property provides an excellent opportunity for investors, first home buyers or downsizers.
With an appealing façade, this bright and natural light filled unit is the perfect first home, or downsizer for those seeking to take on the simple life in the quiet pocket of crib point. Comprising of two generous sized bedrooms with built in robes, a pristine family bathroom with a bath and separate toilet and additional features such as: single lock up garage, laundry & gas wall furnace heating.
With neutral tones throughout, you will be pleasantly surprised at the space and abundant natural light on offer in this immaculate property. The home also offers an open plan living area with internal access to the private rear low maintenance courtyard. The modern kitchen boasts gas stove top and electric oven plus ample cupboard and bench space which flows into the spacious meals area.
Situated just a short walk from public transport and the local shops this property is positioned within arm's reach to all of the local amenities and sure to tick the location box on your search criteria!

Description:
Under Offer
With more character than Mickey Mouse himself, this fabulous four bedroom family home in the heart of Crib Point is one not to be missed. Situated on a generous allotment of 766sqm (Approx),and within a stone's throw to local shops (including pharmacy) & public transport, this home has much to offer its potential purchaser, inside and out.
With a neat and functional, semicircular drive and dual gate access, the property can be securely fenced or opened to access by the large sliding gates, as it also has secondary gates behind the single carport, to assist in maintaining your pooches should you have them!
Upon entering the home you will be greeted by neutral tones and an abundance of natural light, which is reflected throughout the home. With its large exposed beam, vaulted ceilings in the living and adjoining dining and kitchen, the home hosts a spacious feeling to all those who enter. To the kitchen, which is often described as the heart of the home; you will not be disappointed with this home's heart! Consisting of timber hardwood benches, crisp & neutral cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, a generous built in pantry, and ample bench space for all your culinary requirements. With a wonderful outlook to the undercover, decked alfresco area and backyard, the open plan kitchen & living zone is sure to impress.
With 4 bedrooms on offer, the Master is located centrally within the home & features double Built in Robes and a modern and stylish ensuite, with the further 3 bedrooms towards the front of the home, all serviced by double built in robes and a spacious family bathroom. With ample storage, the laundry offers external access to the side yard, and includes large cupboards & drop down ladder access to the ceiling for further storage options. Climate control within the home consists of; ducted heating and a reverse cycle heating/cooling split system. 3 of the four bedrooms offer ceiling fans along with them being located throughout the home's living zones so no matter the season you'll be comfortable.
Hosting a summer BBQ get-together need not be a hassle, with such a functional outdoor living zone, you will be sure to create many a memorable time in such a wonderful space. Complete with outdoor Bar (powered), ceiling fans and café blinds (should the Melbourne weather take one of its unpredictable turns) you will be comfortable all year round hosting your family & friends.
With ample room for off street parking, backyard access and a single lock up shed at the rear, storage need not be an issue should you have a few extra toys to tinker with, this home is ideal for tradespeople and families. With a winning location and ample character, don't miss out on this golden opportunity.

Description:
Under Contract
We are proud to present this magnificent property that represents all that is good about Crib Point- generosity, space and privacy. This idyllically located property close to all that Crib Point has to offer, comprises of an outstanding 3 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom home with carport and large double shed, offering space that is so hard to come these days.
Offering 3 generously sized Bedrooms all with Built in Robes, open plan dining and kitchen including gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher all heated by a wood fire coonara and split system heating and cooling. Outside you'll find a large pergola area ideal for family BBQ or just a nice place to just sit back and enjoy what this well thought out yard has to offer with an abundance of fruit, native and deciduous trees. The large shed on the property offers the perfect space for you to store the camper, trailer or create your own domain for the DIY handyman or mancave the choice is yours.
The suburb of Crib Point has a lot to offer including schools, cafes, shopping and public transport - and boat ramp at Stony Point jetty whilst also remaining only a short drive to local beaches, renowned local wineries and all the Mornington Peninsula has to offer.

Description:
Beautifully Appointed With Dual-Access On 1,150sqm (Approx.)
Highly desirable for its tranquil setting and convenient lifestyle close to shops, transport and Dartnell Reserve; this renovated home delivers immediate comfort with a generous floorplan and a wonderful sense of privacy.
~ A fabulous master suite is well equipped with built-in-robes, ceiling fan, split system heating & cooling, and a full ensuite offering a double shower and vanity.
~ A second master bedroom features a built-in-robe, ensuite and split system heating & cooling.
~ Three remaining bedrooms offer built-in-robes and ceiling fans.
~ The social heart of the home is the open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, dishwasher, breakfast bar and a double fridge cavity.
~ The lounge and dining room seamlessly unfolds to a delightful decked alfresco with an outdoor kitchen, which is considered as an additional living space.
~ Climate controlled by ducted heating and split system heating & cooling in the main living zone.
~ Powder room for guest convenience.
~ Private front fence and a horseshoe driveway with two gated entry points leading to a double carport that is high enough to store a large boat or caravan.
~ Large shed with power and a covered outdoor entertaining area.
~ Further outdoor features include 2kw solar panels, 10,000lt water tank, 1,500lt water tank and flourishing veggie patches.

Description:
Under Contract!
Behold the ultimate family lifestyle home without the hours of yard maintenance you would usually associate with a home of this stature, this property offers all you need to sit back, relax and live the good life!
Situated in a bushy and picturesque location and a stone's throw away from the local schools, shops, sporting facilities and nature walks, Is a home of a grand scale on a generous allotment of approximately 1,054sqm. The home features an impressive façade, with a wraparound veranda and neutral toned exterior, contrasting with the stained timber decking which will be sure to accommodate many a morning cup of tea or coffee as you look out onto a brand new day.
As you enter the home you will be greeted by floating timber flooring, contrasting with crisp white tones, an inviting open plan lounge with built in gas fireplace on a timber feature wall which accompanies the perfect dining area, which will give you the space to host any occasion.
Leading your attention to the kitchen of generous proportions, it is sure to impress and accommodate any a culinary skill set, with a 900mm stainless steel free standing oven/stove, stainless steel appliances, plenty of bench space and a butler's pantry. The kitchen overlooks the undercover alfresco / outdoor entertaining area and a fabulous salt chlorinated in-ground pool which is accessed through solid timber French doors.
With so many features the home is simply a must see, if offers a second living zone, three generous sized bedrooms with BIR, Master bedroom with ensuite and large built in robe, main bathroom with free standing bath, floor to ceiling tiles, LED downlights throughout, a laundry to envy, with ample bench space and cupboards for storage, double lock up garage, ceiling fans indoors and outdoors, and electric wall heating throughout, you are sure to be comfortable all year around.
Outdoors offers low maintenance landscaping and attention to detail evident in design of the alfresco/ entertaining area, it is sure to have that 'wow' factor impact on your guests, as it is the perfect place to host events and gatherings.
Make this property a must see on your property search, Call Jason Dowler anytime for further information!

Description:
Under Contract
Only one of 3 on a subdivided allotment, this 3 year old, unit sized home is situated an ideally short distance to the Disney Street shops and is positioned in a private, well presented development and has a light, open and spacious feel to the home.
Being modern and neutrally toned, the property comprises of master with ensuite, a further two bedrooms with a central bathroom, a modern & functional kitchen with Caesar Stone benches, stainless steel appliances comprising oven, gas hot plates, range hood and dishwasher with square set cornices, carpeted bedrooms & tiled kitchen/ wet areas.
Other comforts of this property include a spacious living/dining area, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, undercover alfresco area overlooking a lovely low maintenance garden and private outdoor area, giving you more time to enjoy the finer things in life.
To top off the conveniences, the home offers a double lock up garage and plenty of storage options.
This wonderful home would suit a multitude of buyers, from downsizers, investors, first home buyers or small families and is only a short distance away from local shops, schools & public transport stations & stops. Offering affordable body corporate fees, unlike some other options around, this home is a must see on your inspections list!

Description:
A Celebration Of Family Living On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
Lovingly maintained, this delightful residence is wonderfully spacious, with room for everyone in the family on approximately 1,040sqm.
~ Greeting you on entry is a spaciously set out lounge and dining room with a wood heater, ceiling fan and split system heating & cooling. Just a few steps away and seamlessly connected is the kitchen, which is a neat and functional space consisting of a Fisher and Paykel dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space.

~ Sizable master bedroom with a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan and an ensuite with a spa bath.
~ Four remaining bedrooms offer built-in-robes.
~ An entertainer's dream with a huge all-weather deck leading to a solar heated swimming pool.
~ 1.5 vehicle carport with side access to a huge 6m x 12m shed with power, mezzanine and a built-in bar.
~ Additional extras include a garden shed, water tanks and fruit trees.
~ Less than 5 minutes to shops, transport and leading schools.

Description:
Light, Bright & Just Right!
This wonderful unit, set amongst established trees is an admirable place to start, downsize or invest!
Refreshingly inviting, the unit has its own street frontage (Facing Milne Street) and driveway and is only one of four on the block!
With a unique façade, this bright and natural light filled unit with all the modern conveniences you could need is the perfect first home or investment in a quiet and appealing pocket of Crib Point.
Situated just a short walk from public transport, the local primary school, pool & shops, and the near-by bushland reserve, this property is positioned within arm's reach to all of the local amenities.
Well maintained, with neutral tones and new flooring recently installed, this homely unit feels fresh and inviting. The kitchen features an electric oven & cooktop and an outlook onto the rear courtyard which has a handy garden shed for storage.
The home also has split system heating & cooling, to assist on the summer days or cold winter nights! To top it all off, the home has an enclosed single garage with rear access to the back courtyard.

Description:
Perfectly Presented And Moments To Everything
Brilliantly designed with free flowing interiors, this immaculate residence is tucked away in a private laneway and will appeal to those seeking a quiet, low maintenance lifestyle.
Everything you might need is within an easy walking distance. Schools are nearby, shops & eateries are around the corner and the Crib Point Recreation Reserve is just a few blocks away.
~ Master bedroom with triple built-in-robes and ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes and easy access to the main bathroom.
~ Open plan living and dining area with split system heating and cooling.
~ Galley kitchen consists of a gas cooktop, plenty of storage and preparation space.
~ Spacious, fully fenced courtyard.
~ Single garage with internal access and gas boosted solar hot water system.

Description:
Leafy Sought After Location
Looking for that family home on a 1/4 acre is getting rare. 4 bed, 2 bath plus 3 living areas, captured with a wrap around decked verandah. The home has ducted heating, air conditioning & an open fireplace in the lounge. The large open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, spacious work areas and ample cupboard space, is bright and airy for the discerning chef. Outside there are twin carports either side, a large garage, workshop & water tank supply for the beautiful gardens. Plus solar panels to reduce those increasing power bills. This home is a credit to the owners & will not disappoint in a leafy part of Crib Point.

Description:
Under Contract
Situated at the end of a quiet no through road and surrounded by other quality homes of a similar scale, sits this charming cottage of a grand scale, with modern touches, however maintaining its original features and character.
Having been recently updated in various aspects, including the flooring, bathrooms and new plaster in the bedrooms, the home is ready for its new owner. A generous and impressive living and dining area is what you will be greeted by as you enter, with vaulted ceilings and a large loft, it is hard to not be wowed. The home offers a large and updated kitchen featuring neutral tones, stainless steel appliances, a large an impressive chef style free standing stove/oven, walk in/butler's pantry, French doors from the meals area to the decked pergola, and filled with natural light from a well-positioned sky light, the kitchen is sure to please. The master bedroom offers a walk in robe and ensuite, which has been updated in line with the main bathroom. The remaining two bedrooms have fully built in double robes which are serviced by the main bathroom which has also been renovated. With stunning timber hardwood floors throughout, Split System cooling, Conara heating, ceiling fan and high ceilings in the lounge room you'll be kept comfortable all year round. With the upstairs loft offering a second living zone, fourth bedroom or recreation room, the possibilities are endless.
Situated on approximately 1491sqm of land, there is ample room to move! With large double gates to the left hand side of the property, there plenty of room to store a boat/caravan or add a carport if required (STCA). Another appealing feature of the home has to be the massive decked pergola, so you can entertain in style, overlooking the backyard and stunning tall gums which will be sure to attract some native guests if you are lucky!
Garden enthusiasts will be delight by rear yard, as it is filled with an abundance of gorgeous fruit trees and ready to go veggie garden, as well as a garden gazebo to relax in on any occasion. The property also offers secure fencing along the front boundary, fencing to secure the backyard from the front and further secure areas within the backyard which are also fenced and gated.
Other features include;
- Single Garage/shed for storage or workshop purposes
- Water tanks
- Enclosed undercover/outdoor cat run
- Garden Art and sculptures
- Secure fencing
- Garden Shed

Address: 269 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Can't Help Falling In Love | 'Heritage Cottage' circa 1900
Peeking through a flowering garden of weeping cherries and daffodils, behind a pretty picket fence, this 'heritage listed' c1900 cottage will capture your heart.
A wealth of period embellishments, such as 12ft ceilings with ornate cornices, intricate fretwork and sash windows, enhance its romantic allure, whilst original timber floorboards provide hints of its historic past.
~ Generous master bedroom with a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan and a semi-ensuite.
~ Additional bedroom with a ceiling fan.
~ Be warmly greeted by a spacious living room, consisting of a gas log fireplace and ceiling fans.
~ Taking centre stage is a kitchen worthy of appearing on the pages of a home design magazine, with a double fridge cavity, Miele dishwasher, walk-in pantry with a sink and preparation bench; and adjoining a dining room with a Nectre wood heater.
~ Awe-inspiring bathroom is a picture of relaxation with a freestanding bath and walk-in shower.
~ Climate controlled by ducted heating and refridgerated cooling throughout.
~ On-trend laundry is replete with encaustic tiles and a W.C. for guest convenience.
~ The home office can be converted into a third bedroom with the luxury of seamless French doors opening onto a large all-weather deck, enabling effortless indoor and outdoor entertaining.
~ Gaze down from the deck to the enchanting rear garden, made private by a lush cloak of citrus growth, herbs, vegetables and an olive tree - just to name a few.
~ Remote-controlled freestanding double garage and a garden shed tucked at the rear.
~ Completing the wish-list in this delightful home is a chook pen and secure side gates.
With so many conveniences so close by it would be difficult to imagine a more desirable location. Only moments to local shops, transport, HMAS Cerberus Naval Base and the Recreation Reserve.
